title: (x) Reggae Smile connected geometric sans - Goodnight {Mike Y}
content: perhaps this has been customized, but i feel like it is an available face to begin with. Thanks in advance. (image attached)
author: mpayson

comments.content:
Sorry, image didn't upload. here it is.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130610214055im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Logotype_3746.jpg)

I would guess Japanese freeware. Here is one that has a similar concept:

[http://www.fenotype.com/font/fonts/Digik.zip](http://web.archive.org/web/20130610214055/http:/www.fenotype.com/font/fonts/Digik.zip "http://www.fenotype.com/font/fonts/Digik.zip")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130610214055im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1F_digitalkauno_4739.gif)

That is close, but I think the actual font is ['Goodnight'](http://web.archive.org/web/20130610214055/http:/www.t26.com/fonts/Goodnight) by Ohyun Kwon.

- Mike Yanega
